name: Pointy Blanc
description:
A small fps project i did for my degree. Just testing what i could learn and its my first attempt at everything about developing a game.

 Constructive comments on how to make it better are welcome and i know its pretty bad for now.

People to check out: AndrewDavid - helped with important advices and he's a great game dev.

https://andrewdavid.games

Tronz - made the original music for the game. Awesome talent.

www.reverbnation.com/tronzzz

https://soundcloud.com/tronzzz
